nodes.text: Praltal was a Gungan male from the small city of Shoril on the planet Naboo. During the Clone Wars between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems, Praltal sympathized with the Confederacy and served as one of its agents on Naboo.
Praltal was mentioned in Rise of the Separatists, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
